alert.note: Alert for Lost River Valleys; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 31 at 4:01AM MST until January 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Shoshone/Lava Beds-Arco/Mud Lake Desert-Lemhi Highlands- Lost River Valley and Sun Valley Region-Including the cities of Shoshone, Carey, Mud Lake, INL, Craters of the Moon, Howe, Arco, Mackay, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Galena, Hailey, Bellevue, and Picabo. * WHEN...From 11 PM Friday to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Lost River Valleys; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills
